name: boorishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is rude and does not consider other people's feelings: He would get drunk at dinner parties and behave boorishly towards his hosts. He could be boorishly insensitive at times, but he was not a bad person. Related word
boorish
More examplesFewer examplesShe stresses that most of her male opponents do not behave so boorishly.The film clip showed him boorishly demanding more champagne from an overworked young waitress.Some people seem boorishly determined to make others in their workplace feel uncomfortable.
